TextView.android:text: Starcraft 2 Is a Strategy Game Released in 2010. There are three races:Terran, Protoss and Zerg. Terran are the human race who use their military and mechanical vehicles and weapons to combat both alien races. Protoss are the advanced alien race who use both magic and technology to battle their foes. Through their understanding of magical elements to wield the power of spellcasters and their discoveries in technology have led topowerful combat robots who are unmatched by the other two races. The zerg are an insect racewho derive their power in numbers. The swarm uses their advanced mobility and powerful creep spread to claim the planet and all those who inhabit it.
